data.body:
right now when you reject a beat with shift-f or the thumbs down, enter the note, and hit the reject button, it just freezes for 5 seconds or so and the table flickers it away.

there should be some kind of ux/ui transition so the user knows we got the request and that it is being processed.

data.title: Final Cut View: Rejecting a beat should provide UX feedback
